source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.
source_objects.title: 3D & Animation

items.title: Destruction with Houdini part_01
items.headline: Create building destruction with custom deforming
objectives_summary: Houdini is a visual effects and 3D animation software like Maya or Blender,but what makes Houdini different and unique is the procedural system and has very powerful dynamic system that other softwares don't have

In this tutorial we cover how to use Houdini to create building destruction using some VEX and custom deforming. We will learn how to create custom cutting tool, also learn how to make custom clumps for destruction. We also using VEX code to control simulation inside DOP.

items.title: Create A Retro Delorean Loop in Cinema 4D and After Effects
items.headline: Create your own retro style loop Cinema 4D & After Effects
objectives_summary: Quickly build a large landscape in Cinema 4D using the 'Displace' tool
Learn how to structure a scene in order to create a seamless loop animation
A fun & colorful retro lighting and rendering style in Cinema 4D

items.title: Blender Animation Series 1.2

items.title: Blender Scripting Series Volume 1.2
